mapper.select: SELECT info.content_id, info.title, info.addr1, info.addr2, info.first_image, info.sido_code, info.gugun_code, sido.sido_name, detail.theme_code, theme.theme_name, detail.category_code, category.category_name, info.latitude, info.longitude, description.overview FROM attraction_info AS info LEFT JOIN (SELECT content_id, theme_code, category_code FROM attraction_detail) AS detail ON info.content_id = detail.content_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT content_id, overview FROM attraction_description) AS description ON info.content_id = description.content_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT sido_code, sido_name FROM sido) AS sido ON info.sido_code = sido.sido_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT theme_code, theme_name FROM theme) AS theme ON detail.theme_code = theme.theme_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT category_code, category_name FROM category) AS category ON detail.category_code = category.category_code WHERE info.content_id = #{contentId};

SELECT info.content_id, info.title, info.addr1, info.addr2, info.first_image, info.sido_code, info.gugun_code, sido.sido_name, detail.theme_code, theme.theme_name, detail.category_code, category.category_name, info.latitude, info.longitude, description.overview FROM k_attraction_info AS info LEFT JOIN (SELECT content_id, theme_code, category_code FROM k_attraction_detail) AS detail ON info.content_id = detail.content_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT content_id, overview FROM k_attraction_description) AS description ON info.content_id = description.content_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT sido_code, sido_name FROM sido) AS sido ON info.sido_code = sido.sido_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT theme_code, theme_name FROM theme) AS theme ON detail.theme_code = theme.theme_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT category_code, category_name FROM category) AS category ON detail.category_code = category.category_code WHERE info.content_id = #{contentId};
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where member_id=#{memberId} and content_id=#{contentId};
mapper.select: select info.content_id, info.title, info.first_image, info.addr1, info.latitude, info.longitude, t.theme_name, description.overView from attraction_info info join attraction_detail detail on info.content_id = detail.content_id join attraction_description description on info.content_id = description.content_id join theme t on t.theme_code = detail.theme_code where sido_code=#{sidoCode} order by info.content_id desc limit #{start}, #{listsize};
select count(content_id) from attraction_info where sido_code = #{sidoCode}

select info.content_id, info.title, info.first_image, info.addr1, info.latitude, info.longitude, t.theme_name, description.overView from attraction_info info join attraction_detail detail on info.content_id = detail.content_id join attraction_description description on info.content_id = description.content_id join theme t on t.theme_code = detail.theme_code join bookmark b on b.content_id = info.content_id where b.member_id=#{memberId};

select b.id bookmark_id, a.content_id, a.title, a.first_image, a.first_image2 from attraction_info a, ( select id, content_id from bookmark where member_id = #{memberId} ) b where a.content_id = b.content_id order by bookmark_id desc limit #{start}, #{listsize}
select count(id) from bookmark where member_id = #{memberId}

INSERT INTO attraction_detail (content_id, theme_code, category_code) VALUES (#{contentId}, #{themeCode}, #{categoryCode});
